channel.title: How to Run Matrix 718/724
channel.description:
When you run matrix 718/724 it gives u an error on the command prompt, Heres how to fix:
Right click "[u]run[/u]" then select "[u]edit[/u]" then delete the "-server" part.
You will also need a compiler here is a tut to make one. Make a new .txt file, rename it Compiler.bat not "compiler.bat.txt" then right click select edit and place the code provided below.[code=java]@echo off title Build echo Building please wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java echo Build complete. pause[/code] [b][u]MAKE SURE TO EDIT IT TO YOUR JAVA SETTINGS![/u][/b]

item.title: How to Run Matrix 718/724
item.dc:creator: @methodd methodd
item.description:
@methodd wrote:

When you run matrix 718/724 it gives u an error on the command prompt, Heres how to fix:

Right click “run” then select “edit” then delete the “-server” part.

You will also need a compiler here is a tut to make one.
Make a new .txt file, rename it Compiler.bat not “compiler.bat.txt” then right click select edit and place the code provided below.@echo off title Build echo Building please wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java echo Build complete. pause MAKE SURE TO EDIT IT TO YOUR JAVA SETTINGS!

Read full topic
